comments:
1. Import a SML-IF file, such as Rules/Valid.xml
2. Type in a folder in a destination project that does not currently exist in the project (such as "/Foo/bar" when there is no "Foo" project) *or* specify a project root folder for an existing project (e.g. "/Test" if "Test" is a pre-existing project).
3. Observe the following exception in the error log:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Path.<init>(Path.java:152)
	at org.eclipse.cosmos.rm.smlif.internal.importing.ui.ImportFromSMLIFWizardPage.retrieveAbsolutePath(ImportFromSMLIFWizardPage.java:290)
	at org.eclipse.cosmos.rm.smlif.internal.importing.ui.ImportFromSMLIFWizardPage.doImport(ImportFromSMLIFWizardPage.java:254)
	at org.eclipse.cosmos.rm.smlif.internal.importing.ui.ImportFromSMLIFWizard.performFinish(ImportFromSMLIFWizard.java:45)
	at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.finishPressed(WizardDialog.java:742)

This is a regression error.  It's possible that the operation itself is handling these cases, but the wizard is doing extra work that doesn't account for them.
I will submit the patch when the stream opens again for development.  Re-targeting defect to future.
